meanings.definition: A projecting part of a column or pilaster.
meanings.sent1: The apophyges of the column added an elegant touch to the building.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully designed the apophyges to complement the overall structure.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the apophyges as a hiding spot for its acorns.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas served as the apophyges that supported the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The intricate carvings on the apophyges made them stand out from the rest of the column.

meanings.definition: A projecting molding at the base of a column.
meanings.sent1: The apophyges at the base of the column were beautifully crafted.
meanings.sent2: Visitors admired the detailed work on the apophyges of the ancient pillar.
meanings.sent3: The playful cat enjoyed scratching its claws on the apophyges of the column.
